title: Any fix for all WIFI connections giving error "Failed to connect to network" short of factory reset?
content:
I've gone through all the basic troubleshooting steps here: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6183600?hl=en

I'm trying to figure out why suddenly a couple days ago my WIFI would no longer work and I receive the error "Failed to connect to network" no matter what network I try to connect to. Tested home and hotspot networks with other devices, no issue. Cellular works fine, everything else works fine...but not WIFI.
